content: Life's like a box of chocolates, you never know what you're gonna get. Quite similar to this blog post..
What has a banana, a taco and three fingers? I have no idea, just like I have no idea what point you're trying to make with this post.
This was an amazing article. My hats off to you and your dog 'Pippin' who seems enjoy a nice game of 'peanut butter toes' just like anyone would.
